dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A twenty-year manhunt just ended with an extradition from Russia to Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A twenty-year manhunt just ended with an extradition from Russia to Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Kazakhstani citizen was extradited from Russia to face criminal charges for involvement in an organized crime group, large-scale drug trafficking, and smuggling. After 20 years in hiding, he was arrested in December last year in Russia's Samara region and extradited to Kazakhstan upon request.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for a guy involved in a massive drug trafficking ring, right? The Prosecutor General's Office said he was part of a group moving heroin and opium from Uzbekistan through Kazakhstan into Russia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for a guy involved in a massive drug trafficking ring, right? The Prosecutor General's Office said he was part of a group moving heroin and opium from Uzbekistan through Kazakhstan into Russia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Prosecutor General's Office, the suspect joined a criminal network in 2003 that trafficked heroin and opium from Uzbekistan through Kazakhstan to Russia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And get this—back in 2003, during operations in the Kyzylorda and Karaganda regions, authorities seized 35 kilograms of heroin and 28 kilograms of opium.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And get this-back in two thousand three, during operations in the Kyzylorda and Karaganda regions, authorities seized thirty five kilograms of heroin and twenty eight kilograms of opium.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During special operations in 2003 in Kyzylorda and Karaganda regions, 35 kg of heroin and 28 kg of opium were seized," the press service reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a huge amount. So this suspect was specifically handling transport and storage before handing the drugs off to others?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a huge amount. So this suspect was specifically handling transport and storage before handing the drugs off to others?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The suspect was responsible for transporting, storing, and handing over drugs to other members for distribution.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's what it sounds like. He managed to flee when some of his associates were convicted, but after two decades hiding in Russia finally caught up with him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what it sounds like. He managed to flee when some of his associates were convicted, but after two decades hiding in Russia finally caught up with him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While some group members were convicted, the suspect fled and was placed on an international wanted list. After 20 years in hiding, he was arrested in December last year in Russia's Samara region and extradited to Kazakhstan upon request.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: In the Samara region, wasn't it? Arrested last December and sent back.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In the Samara region, wasn't it? Arrested last December and sent back.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After 20 years in hiding, he was arrested in December last year in Russia's Samara region and extradited to Kazakhstan upon request.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, now he's in a pre-trial detention center facing some serious time—like 10 to 15 years, plus property confiscation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, now he's in a pre-trial detention center facing some serious time-like ten to fifteen years, plus property confiscation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He is currently in a pre-trial detention center," the agency added. He now faces 10 to 15 years in prison with property confiscation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild to think he was on the run for so long. Makes you wonder how many others are still out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild to think he was on the run for so long. Makes you wonder how many others are still out there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. International cooperation really made the difference here—Russia extraditing him upon request after all these years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. International cooperation really made the difference here-Russia extraditing him upon request after all these years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After 20 years in hiding, he was arrested in December last year in Russia's Samara region and extradited to Kazakhstan upon request.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely sends a message that you can't hide forever, especially with organized crime crossing borders like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely sends a message that you can't hide forever, especially with organized crime crossing borders like that.
